methods.name: getRotation
javadoc: Determines the rotation that is equivalent to this mirror if the rotating object faces in the given direction

methods.name: mirror
javadoc: Mirrors the given rotation like specified by this mirror. rotations start at 0 and go up to rotationCount-1. 0 is front, rotationCount/2 is back.

methods.name: mirror
javadoc: Mirror the given facing according to this mirror
